name: Reflecting Fate
summary: Game represents detective thriller from the first person with elements of my mysticism.  Action takes place in 1996 in Denwood, player personates as its original resident. Suddenly cattle began to disappear on the island. Animals disappeared at nights absolutely without a trace, and, it seems that nobody could prevent it.  But everything changed in one day. Disappearances affected the family of the lead character, that’s why he couldn’t step aside. Step by step, trace by trace, proof by proof, he was to explore what happened and what scary mystery was kept by island Denwood.
